short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces Clinton (Bill or Hillary) with Jasper. So much better.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: All respect to the Clintons, but if you're also a Jasper fan, this swaps her name into all the news. It was either Clinton, Sanders or Trump, but when Jasper read a few of the changed headlines, preferred to masquerade as Clinton.
